movies.name: Friends
movies.description: Follow the lives of six reckless adults living in Manhattan, as they indulge in adventures which make their lives both troublesome and happening.

movies.name: Sons of Anarchy
movies.description: Jax Teller, a man in his early 30s, struggles to find a balance in his life between being a new dad and his involvement in a motorcycle gang.

movies.name: The Union
movies.description: Mike, a down-to-earth construction worker, is thrust into the world of super spies and secret agents when his high school sweetheart, Roxanne, recruits him on a high-stakes US intelligence mission.

movies.name: Shawshank redemption
movies.description: Andy Dufresne, a successful banker, is arrested for the murders of his wife and her lover, and is sentenced to life imprisonment at the Shawshank prison. He becomes the most unconventional prisoner.

movies.name: We're the Millers
movies.description: David, a drug dealer, plans to go to Mexico to pick up a shipment of Marijuana. He hires a stripper, Rose, and two teenagers to pose as his family and cross the border without arousing suspicion.

movies.name: Suits
movies.description: A college dropout, Mike Ross, possesses immense competence. A set of circumstances leads to him effectively working as a law associate for Harvey Specter despite not having gone to law school.

movies.name: The electric state
movies.description: The Electric State is a 2025 American science fiction action-adventure film produced and directed by Anthony and Joe Russo. Its screenplay by Christopher Markus and Stephen McFeely is loosely based on the 2018 illustrated novel by Simon St√•lenhag.

movies.name: Back in action
movies.description: Former CIA spies Emily and Matt are pulled back into espionage after their secret identities are exposed.

movies.name: The order
movies.description: A string of violent robberies in the Pacific Northwest leads veteran FBI agent Terry Husk to a white supremacist group; the group plans to overthrow the federal government.

movies.name: Breaking bad
movies.description: Walter White, a chemistry teacher, discovers that he has cancer and decides to get into the meth-making business to repay his medical debts. His priorities begin to change when he partners with Jesse.

movies.name: Ozark
movies.description: This drama series stars Jason Bateman as Marty Byrde, a financial planner who relocates his family from Chicago to a summer resort community in the Ozarks. With wife Wendy and their two kids in tow, Marty is on the move after a money-laundering scheme goes wrong, forcing him to pay off a substantial debt to a Mexican drug lord in order to keep his family safe.

movies.name: Black-ish
movies.description: A man tries to get his family to mingle with the neighbours and form a rapport with them in an effort to fit in and find his place in society.

movies.name: Oblitereted
movies.description: An elite special forces team thwarts a deadly threat to Las Vegas; after a celebratory party, the team discovers that the bomb they deactivated was a fake; now intoxicated, the team has to find the real bomb and save the world.

movies.name: Avatar
movies.description: Jake, a paraplegic marine, replaces his brother on the Na'vi-inhabited Pandora for a corporate mission. He is accepted by the natives as one of their own, but he must decide where his loyalties lie.

movies.name: Ready player one
movies.description: When the creator of a virtual reality world called OASIS dies, he leaves a challenge behind. Hidden inside the virtual world is an Easter Egg, which grants a worthy person total control over OASIS.

movies.name: IT
movies.description: This is a 2017 supernatural horror film based on Stephen King's novel, following a group of seven children in Derry, Maine, who face a shape-shifting, demonic entity that preys on their fears, disguised as a clown named Pennywise.

movies.name: Brooklyn nine-nine
movies.description: Ray Holt, an eccentric commanding officer, and his diverse and quirky team of odd detectives solve crimes in Brooklyn, New York City.

movies.name: YOU
movies.description: What would you do for love? For Joe, an intense young man who frequently becomes smitten with beautiful, smart women, this question is put to the test. A charming yet awkward crush becomes something more sinister when love turns into obsession for Joe.

movies.name: Lord of the rings
movies.description: Epic drama set thousands of years before the events of J.R.R. Tolkien's 'The Hobbit' and 'The Lord of the Rings' follows an ensemble cast of characters, both familiar and new, as they confront the long-feared re-emergence of evil to Middle-earth.

movies.name: The nun
movies.description: A priest and a novice arrive in Romania to investigate the death of a young nun. However, things take an ugly turn after they encounter a supernatural force.

movies.name: The queen's gambit
movies.description: Set during the Cold War era, orphaned chess prodigy Beth Harmon struggles with addiction in a quest to become the greatest chess player in the world.

movies.name: Game of Thrones
movies.description: Nine noble families wage war against each other in order to gain control over the mythical land of Westeros. Meanwhile, a force is rising after millenniums and threatens the existence of living men.

movies.name: Prison break
movies.description: Michael Scofield finds himself in the Ogygia Prison in Sana'a, Yemen, seven years after his apparent death. His friends, brother and fellow escapee do everything it takes to bring him home.

movies.name: Moratal engines
movies.description: In a post-apocalyptic world where cities move and consume each other to survive, two strangers come together to stop a sinister and destructive conspiracy.
